propositions.text: 凫氏掌王及后妃亲庙祭祀。
祭祀所用的牲畜须为完整的。
凫氏祭祀的礼仪与宗伯相同。
凡祭祀，若祭祀者为亲属，则由其下属负责；若非亲属，则由凫氏指派；若祭祀者有属官，则由其属官负责。
《周礼·春官宗伯》记载了凫氏的职责。
凫氏掌王及后妃亲庙祭祀。
凡祭祀，亲属或祭，则以其属；不亲属，则属焉；凡有属，则属焉。
“全”指祭祀用的牲畜须完整无缺。
“宗伯”是周代官名，掌管礼仪、宗庙祭祀等事务。

concepts.name: 凫氏
concepts.context: As the primary subject of the document, its role and responsibilities in ancient Chinese governance are detailed.

concepts.name: 祭祀
concepts.context: The central theme of the document, describing the protocols and personnel involved in royal sacrifices.

concepts.name: 宗伯
concepts.context: Mentioned as a comparable or related official to 凫氏, indicating a similar scope of responsibilities in ritual.

concepts.name: 王
concepts.context: The ultimate authority figure whose sacrifices and rituals are managed by the 凫氏.

concepts.name: 后妃
concepts.context: Also under the purview of the 凫氏's sacrificial duties, indicating the scope of royal family involvement.

concepts.name: 牲畜
concepts.context: A key component of sacrifices, with specific requirements for its condition ('全').

concepts.name: 礼仪
concepts.context: The established customs and procedures governing sacrifices, shared between 凫氏 and 宗伯.

concepts.name: 亲属
concepts.context: A category of individuals involved in sacrifices, influencing who performs the ritual.

concepts.name: 下属
concepts.context: Responsible for carrying out sacrifices when the principal is a relative.

concepts.name: 属官
concepts.context: Another category of personnel involved in sacrifices, responsible when the principal has such officials.

concepts.name: 《周礼·春官宗伯》
concepts.context: The textual source for the information presented about the 凫氏.

concepts.name: 全
concepts.context: A specific requirement for sacrificial animals, meaning complete and without defect.

hierarchy.structure: The document primarily defines the role of '凫氏' in managing royal sacrifices, drawing heavily from the text '《周礼·春官宗伯》'. It elaborates on the specifics of the sacrifices, including the condition of the sacrificial animals and the hierarchy of personnel involved.
